EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne_Platform_2017.Ahoy Matey 9-19-17
EmailTemplate.subject: Save Some Serious Booty on Your SpringOne Platform Pass
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Ahoy Matey!
In honor of "International Talk Like a Pirate Day <[[http://talklikeapirate.com]]>," we've extended our Springone Platform discounted pricing for one more month. This is your last chance to save some booty for use towards your hotel, flights, Uber/Lyft rides, lattes, a new ship … you get the ideaaaaarrghhh.
Leave the doldrums behind this December and sail into 2018 with the wind at your back!
X Marks the Spot! <[[https://2017.springoneplatform.io/ehome/s1p/registration?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-discount-pricing-extended-q317]]>
Keep a weather eye open for updates to the SpringOne Platform agenda! Sessions and speakers are added weekly.
Aye Aye, The Pivotal Team
